name: @teplovs/frontend-ui
description: A new JavaScript framework for developing powerful web applications
author: Teplovs

scripts.build: rollup -c rollup.config.js && minify ./Distribution/FrontendUI.esm.js --out-file ./Distribution/FrontendUI.esm.min.js --mangle.keepClassName --sourceType module && minify ./Distribution/FrontendUI.umd.js --out-file ./Distribution/FrontendUI.umd.min.js --mangle.keepClassName --sourceType module
